attributes.action: All schools should allow phones to be used at break and in lessons as a resource
attributes.additional_details: Eton college allow phones in lessons and it’s one of the best schools in the UK.
attributes.background: Technology is getting greater and becoming a good resource for education. Technology will obviously be the way forward in the future so why are schools preventing it.

rejection.details: This would be a decision for your school and not the UK Government or Parliament.
